Welcome to our site

x

Candidatul ideal

Are you an experienced Software Developer or Automation Tester, with a strong background in technologies like C#, .NET, Java, PHP, SQL server or JavaScript? Come work with us! You will develop or test software used in a wide variety of businesses. We are more interested in innate talent than years of experience, as we create an appropriate environment in order to facilitate the know-how transfer and to assure access to technology and encourage personal evolution.

Descrierea jobului

You will be part of a multi-cultural team, where you will be supported to test and apply your ideas while co-creating a better future. Click the Apply button, check out the diverse range of roles and choose the one which fits you best!

); };
